title: LF for TOP/MID G1-D4 for flex team and upcoming clash events.
body:
Hey Legends, looking for a top and or mid laner to play, practice and improve as a team. Team skill level is currently averaging high plat and there is no perfered play style or champ pools i will draft around you.

Please add me at "Mr Von" if interesed!

Thankyou for your time have a great day/night
